name: Ludo Kings 3d 2018
description:
Welcome to the ludo game! Get ready for the ludo board game which is offers you awesome stars game. Ludo is an amazing and super board game which you can play with your lovely friends. It is not online game. Are you ready to make ludo top star? Play it with your friends and become the master of ludo 2018. 2 Player and 4 player play this game in one device.`Ludo is very classic game of subcontinent. Ludo is indian game. Ludo is similar to the Parchisi game. Ludo is a strategy fun game. Parchis game contain local rules along with international rules so dont worry. So don't wait any further, get the dice rolling and start game. 2 Player and 4 player play this game in one device.`
Features:
-Opportunity to play with friends offline
-Real amazing Dice
-Attractive and mind blowing graphics
